de.rincewind.api.gui.elements

Interface ElementBrick

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Element, ElementButton, ElementDisplayable, ElementSizeable, EventBased, Sizeable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CraftElementBrick, Elements.ElementBrickExtendable

    public interface ElementBrick
extends ElementButton
    If the user clicks on this element, on the cursor an item will be set.
    Since:
    2.3.3
    Author:
    Rincewind34
    See Also:
    Elements.ElementBrickExtendable

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack createItem()

      Sets the ItemCreator, to create the item to set on the cursor
